DynamixAuth.Enums.QR_CODE_GENERATED String QR_CODE_GENERATED

Methods

<static> retrieveIp(qrAuthListener)

Retrieve the IP Address of the Dynamix device. This method is automatically called by the showQRCode() method when the auto flag is set to true by the client. The web client can also make an explicit request to this function to retrieve the ip address of the pairing Dynamix device.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
qrAuthListener function
Example
var authListener = function(status) {
            switch(status){
                case DynamixAuth.Enums.QR_CODE_GENERATED: 
                    //QR Code successfully generated
                    doSomething();
                    break;
                case DynamixAuth.Enums.DYNAMIX_DEVICE_FOUND :
                    //Dynamix device ip was successfully retrieved.
                    doSomething();
                    break;
                case DynamixAuth.Enums.DYNAMIX_DEVICE_NOT_FOUND :
                    //Could not retrieve Dynamix device ip.
                    doSomething();                    
                    break;
            }
        };    
        DynamixAuth.retrieveIp(authListener);

<static> showQRCode(app_name, qrParams, qrAuthListener, auto)

Generate a Dynamix authentication QR Code.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
app_name function The name of the Web Application. This will be displayed on the
qrParams Object Parameters for the QR Code.
qrAuthListener function The web client should provide a listener which would listen to changes in the authentication state.
auto Boolean A Boolean flag which tells Dynamix to automatically start retrieving the Dynamix device's IP address.
Example
var authListener = function(status) {
            switch(status){
                case DynamixAuth.Enums.QR_CODE_GENERATED: 
                	//QR Code successfully generated
                    doSomething();
                    break;
                case DynamixAuth.Enums.DYNAMIX_DEVICE_FOUND :
                	//Dynamix device ip was successfully retrieved.
                    doSomething();
                    break;
                case DynamixAuth.Enums.DYNAMIX_DEVICE_NOT_FOUND :
                	//Could not retrieve Dynamix device ip.
                    doSomething();                    
                    break;
            }
        };    
		var qrParams = {};
        qrParams.divId = 'dialog-div';
        qrParams.width = 256;
        qrParams.height = 256;
        DynamixAuth.showQRCode('Alien Invasion', qrParams, authListener, true);
